title: 81/356/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 May 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Daybreak- TL oven temperature controller, model 520, with AC power control model 521; - alpha counter, model 580/1; - icepoint compensator with module bin and rack mounting' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
Commission Decision
of 11 May 1981
establishing that the apparatus described as "Daybreak — TL oven temperature controller, model 520, with AC power control, model 521 ; — alpha counter, model 580/1 ; — icepoint compensator with module bin and rack mounting" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(81/356/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Daybreak — TL oven temperature controller, model 520, with AC power control, model 521 ; — alpha counter, model 580/1 ; — icepoint compensator with module bin and rack mounting" which is the subject of an application by the Government of the United Kingdom of 22 October 1980 may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
his Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 May 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz Narjes
Member of the Commission
[1] OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
[2] OJ No L 134, 31. 5. 1979, p. 1.
[3] OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
--------------------------------------------------
